# Disposables.AddRange method

Adds the specified disposables.

```csharp
public void AddRange(IEnumerable<IDisposable> disposables)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| disposables | The disposables. |

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| ObjectDisposedException | AddRange called after Dispose. |
